original_text: the only thing that could possibly make them less interesting than they already are is for them to get full montied into a scrappy , jovial team .
generated_text:
1. "I'd rather watch paint dry than sit through another dull, uninspired team-building exercise."
2. "The only thing that could make this movie more cringeworthy is if the characters started singing and dancing together."
3. "I'd rather stick needles in my eyes than watch this group of people become a'scrappy, jovial team'."
4. "The thought of these characters working together as a cohesive unit is enough to make me want to roll my eyes out of my head."
